title: How can the media help small businesses? - Quora

response.answer_text: Benefits of social media to the small businesses With nearly 50% of the world are using social media platforms they are a natural place to reach the newly targeted audience Humanize your brand Think people only connect with brands they already know on social media. If you show proofs then you can make your brand more humanize Establish your brand as a thought leader No matter what industry is in, Social media offers the opportunity to establish your brands as a thought leader the go-to source for information on topics related to your niche Stay top of the mind Most Social media users log into their accounts at least once per day. and many people checking social media multiple times per day

The media is the published communications channels like newspapers, magazines, TV, radio, etc. Many of these allow PR releases that if published is one of the cheapest advertising channels available. Larger companies have a complete department dedicated to communicating with those outlets. Another definition of media is social media which has become channels in which businesses can place PR like messages or purchase advertising spots.
